statements: SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sale_quantity, sale_amount FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_id, product_name, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC, sale_quantity ASC;
SELECT product_name, sale_quantity, sale_amount, sale_date, product_id FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_name, SUM(sale_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE product_id = 5 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, AVG(sale_amount) AS average_sale_amount FROM sales_data GROUP BY product_name HAVING AVG(sale_amount) > 500;
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_name, sales_quantity, sales_date FROM sales_data ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, sales_quantity FROM sales_data WHERE sales_quantity > 100;
SELECT product_name, sales_quantity FROM sales_data WHERE sales_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT product_id, product_name, sales_quantity, sales_date FROM sales_data WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT product_name, sales_date, sales_quantity FROM sales_data WHERE sales_quantity > 100 ORDER BY sales_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory_data WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, current_stock FROM inventory_data WHERE current_stock < 50 AND last_restock_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_name, current_stock, last_restock_date FROM inventory_data ORDER BY current_stock ASC, last_restock_date DESC;
SELECT sales_quantity, product_name FROM sales_data WHERE sales_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC, sales_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM fast_moving_products;
SELECT product_name, units_sold FROM fast_moving_products ORDER BY units_sold DESC;
SELECT product_name, units_available FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE units_available < 10;
SELECT product_name, units_in_stock FROM potential_stockouts WHERE product_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT product_id, product_name, units_sold FROM fast_moving_products WHERE units_sold > 100 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM fast_moving_products WHERE units_sold > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE units_available < 50 ORDER BY product_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, units_available FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE units_available BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, units_in_stock FROM potential_stockouts WHERE units_in_stock < 10 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, units_sold FROM fast_moving_products WHERE units_sold > 200 ORDER BY units_sold DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM fast_moving_products
SELECT product_name, sales_volume FROM fast_moving_products ORDER BY sales_volume DESC
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < 10
SELECT product_name, days_until_stockout FROM potential_stockouts WHERE days_until_stockout > 30
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT product_name, sales_volume FROM fast_moving_products ORDER BY sales_volume DESC;
SELECT product_name, quantity_in_stock FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE quantity_in_stock < 50;
SELECT product_name, days_until_stockout FROM potential_stockouts ORDER BY days_until_stockout ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC;
SELECT s.sale_id, s.sale_amount, c.customer_id FROM sales_data s JOIN customers c ON s.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM fast_moving_products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, units_sold FROM fast_moving_products WHERE units_sold > 1000;
SELECT product_name, units_sold FROM fast_moving_products WHERE revenue > 5000;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, units_in_stock FROM slow_moving_inventory WHERE units_in_stock < 50;
SELECT product_name, units_sold FROM fast_moving_products ORDER BY units_sold DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, revenue FROM fast_moving_products WHERE units_sold > 10000;
SELECT product_name, units_in_stock FROM slow_moving_inventory ORDER BY units_in_stock ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, units_available FROM potential_stockouts WHERE reorder_level < 10;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
